text:
How to generate a PowerPoint with Nano Banana:

1. Go to gamma. app.
2. Create a free account.
3. Click “Create new (AI).”
4. Click “Generate” and write your prompt.
5. Example: “A pitch deck for DISC personality.”
6. Pick 8-60 slides and generate the outline.
7. Select ‘nano banana pro’ in AI images.
8. Review the outline and theme, then finalize.

Now you have slides, ready to edit with prompts.

Nano Banana Pro is available for all Gamma users, even the free ones. Stop wasting hours on manual design. Gamma builds your slides in minutes.

tl;dr:
✦ Go to gamma. app and sign up free.
✦ Pick Nano Banana Pro for stunning visuals.
